name: Wizwag
description:
Hello! Nice to see you here.

Have you ever thought what is it like if you can be a Wizard who ran into a dungeon with a powerful "WEAPON" with unlimited bullets. Here it is a video game that you'd like.

- Play as a wizard and kill all enemies - - Simple Key movement W A S D for walking  - SPACE or Left Mouse Button to fire - 25% Chance for enemies to kindly give you items - End of each level you will get a chance to upgrade - Every 5 level you will meet a boss who LOOKING FORWARD TO PLAY WITH YOU

Thanks for the assets from here ( I cannot remember all the sources so DO NOT hesitate to contact me )

Fire Pixel Bullet 16x16 by blackdragon1727 (itch.io)

16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72 (itch.io)

Pixel Art GUI Elements by Mounir Tohami (itch.io)

Mack's WW2 Mega gun pack[FREE] by Mack (itch.io)

Interface Bleeps by Bleeoop (itch.io)

Snake's Authentic Gun Sounds by SnakeF8 (itch.io)

Mythril Age SFX Pack v1 by Mythril Age (itch.io)

You don't need a hero - Sound assets by evilduckk (itch.io)

IF YOU SEE ANYTHING STRANGE IT IS " FEATURES "
